Package com.mira.languagestudio.core.factory.resources

Class DefaultResourceLoader

java.lang.Object
com.mira.languagestudio.core.factory.resources.DefaultResourceLoader
public class DefaultResourceLoader extends Object
DefaultResourceLoader is a class that is responsible for loading all data from JSON files into the registry.

The class provides a way of loading language information, instructions, and other data from JSON files and storing them in a registry. It also provides methods for adding new resources and updating existing ones.

Since:
1.0
